title: Ep 31: Live from Ludlow House: Stealing Beauty
itunes:title: Ep 31: Live from Ludlow House: Stealing Beauty
itunes:subtitle: When is borrowing or being influenced by hair and makeup from a culture other than your own okay, and when is it wrong? In their first live recorded episode at Ludlow House in NYC, Jess & Jenn host a roundtable with beauty experts Ursula Stephen, M...
description:
When is borrowing or being influenced by hair and makeup from a culture other than your own okay, and when is it wrong? In their first live recorded episode at Ludlow House in NYC, Jess & Jenn host a roundtable with beauty experts Ursula Stephen, Mally Roncal, and Alicia Yoon to discuss cultural appropriation.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
